description: The 2nd episode of our in-house talent competition is in the books! Several Justians enjoyed showing off their skills while their colleagues cheered them on.

image.alt: Hug Pugs and Friends at the Los Altos Pet Parade

columns.blockSubtitle: Hug Pugs and Friends at the Los Altos Pet Parade
description: Zoey and her friends throughout the SF Bay area had fun spreading happiness while marching in the annual Los Altos Pet Parade last month!
